grid

Class AbstractGridBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • grid.AbstractGridBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileGridBuilder, RandomGridBuilder

    public abstract class AbstractGridBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Super class for implementations of grid builder. Grid builder is responsible for constructing all the squares of which the grid is composed. It also places walls, teleports and all items.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Wall> walls
      The walls which are placed on the grid.

      Constructors

      Initializes objects needed by the grid builder.
